data.name: Squarewood Farm
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Squarewood Farm! Here in this quaint country town, you have just become the proud new owner of a fertile square. Can you master the craft of square-farming and ensure yourself a bountiful, quadrangular harvest?

Plant blocks of seeds to fill rows or 3x3 squares. This addictive and satisfying block placement gameplay is easy to learn, but has plenty of room for mastery for the dedicated square farmer.

Key Features
  • Unlock a variety of seeds with distinct block shapes, difficulties and rewards. Find the perfect crop to match your playstyle.
  • Spend your hard-earned money constructing buildings for your farm. Watch your cozy farm grow over time.
  • Acquire useful quirks and tricks by purchasing tools that help make farming the field easier.
  • Animals! Animals need fenced areas to feed, but provide you with profitable animal products instead of crops.

data.short_description: A relaxing and addictive farm-themed block puzzler. Harvest crops by forming rows, columns or squares with strangely shaped seeds. Use the profits from your vegetables to purchase tools, buy animals, or expand your humble farm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
